name: Hamish Hamster
description:
You are a hamster that has been forgotten and must escape your old home using what has also forgotten for some time. 

*** Controls ***

WASD - Movement

E - Interact

F - "Consume" Objects

ESC  - Sound/Restart

This is the first game jam I've ever completed! My game isn't perfect, don't be too surprised if it's a little buggy. 

Thanks for checking my game out!
